entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58468
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextSansFilter #58467
  • [ASP.NET] We need to get the set of analyzer rules in dotnet/sdk sync with dotnet/aspnetcore #58463
  • UseForwardedHeaders should raise more prominent errors for unknown proxies #58461
  • JDK zip not found when running `.\eng\scripts\InstallJdk.ps1` #58457
  • OIDC middleware will not use forwarded headers in challenge construction #58455
  • JSInterop Exception in Published Blazor WebAssembly App (Server Mode) #58454
  • Perf regression: https #58452
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, plaintext #58451

Closed

  • [PERF] Lighthouse benchmarks failing #58424
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #58371
  • JSInterop Exception in Published Blazor WebAssembly App (Server Mode) #58453
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext, updates #58404
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #58446
  • OnAfterRenderAsync Not Triggered After Migrating to Blazor Web App with Server Interactive Render Mode in .NET 8 #58438

PullRequests

Created

  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58476
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Linux machine with Chrome #58473
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve dev-certs export error message #58472
    area-commandlinetools
  • [release/8.0] Update locked dependencies #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Use MacOS-13 in CI #58465
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Improve dev-certs export error message #58471
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Improve dev-certs export error message #58470
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.11
  • [release/9.0] bumping ws dependency to fix component vulnerability #58458
    area-signalr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages #58469
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0.0
  • Move Windows.Amd64.VS2022.Pre.Open to Helix-Matrix #58460
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update global.json to 10.0 sdk #58425
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix flaky Http2WebSocket Kestrel test #58448
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove bulk disables of CA warnings #58428
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Revert trimming test workarounds #58272
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
